plot: Two honorable men-for-hire look for adventure in the pre-World War I American southwest in their fancy Stutz Bearcat.
plot_en: Two honorable men-for-hire look for adventure in the pre-World War I American southwest in their fancy Stutz Bearcat.
plot_es: Two honorable men-for-hire look for adventure in the pre-World War I American southwest in their fancy Stutz Bearcat.
title: Dos contra el mundo
